Key Match Events: Norman Powell posted his first career double-double with 31 points and 12 rebounds.
James Harden added 22 points for the Clippers.
Kevin Porter Jr. scored nine points in the fourth quarter.
De’Aaron Fox led the Kings with 31 points.
Domantas Sabonis added 23 points and 12 rebounds for the Kings.
The Kings cut a 16-point fourth-quarter deficit to four with under three minutes to play, but Powell and Amir Coffey hit consecutive 3-pointers to push the lead back to double digits.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers are above .500 for the first time this season after a 2-4 start.
The Kings were 3 of 26 from 3-point range and made just one 3 in the second half.
Norman Powell has scored 20 points or more for the eighth straight game.
